data.message: Hello, I just submitted this exact message but it says that it won't be viewed by a live person and nor will anything be done about it and it's just for improving the guidelines later or some nonsense. Here, see for yourself: "I see absolutely no reason as to why I was blocked temporarily like this. I make a living off of promotions and recruiting new people to the company I work for. It's urgent that I am able to post in groups immediately. Also, I think it happened to due me just requesting to join too many groups for work home opportunities all at once which I had no idea there was a limit to but you definitely CAN NOT just block me like this without a warning! Please unblock ASAP. Thanks!"

replies.message: Hi, Margad. It sounds like you may have overused a feature, even if you didn't mean to. Hold tight until you can access the feature again. In the meantime, you can learn more about our policies by reviewing the Facebook Community Standards: http://bit.ly/2jPBCE6. -Rhea

I can't just hold tight. You guys blocked me from doing what I do to earn income. I think it said I gotta wait like a week or two. I can't do that. This profile is connected to certain groups after undergoing several different processes and I gotta be able to post there. Facebook must have given me a warning that I may be blocked from requesting to join too many groups before just doing it out of nowhere. Please unblock me now!
